mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EL_MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME ) VALUES ( EL_MEMBER_SEQ_NO.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO as memberNo, EMAIL as email, MEMBER_PW as memberPw, EMAIL_VERIFIED as emailVerified, MEMBER_NICKNAME as memberNickname, ROLE as role, CREATED_AT as createdAt FROM EL_MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
